title.en: Biographies of Bian Que and the Duke of Cang
title.raw: 《扁鵲倉公列傳》 Biographies of Bian Que and the Duke of Cang

sentences.zh: 扁鵲者，勃海郡鄭人也，姓秦氏，名越人。

translations.literal: Bian Que, Bo Hai jun Zheng person, surname Qin shi, name Yue Ren.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que was from Zheng in Bohai commandery, surname Qin, given name Yue Ren.

sentences.zh: 少時為人舍長。

translations.literal: Young time become person she chang.
translations.idiomatic: In his youth he served as a lodging house manager.

sentences.zh: 舍客長桑君過，扁鵲獨奇之，常謹遇之。

translations.literal: She guest Chang Sang Jun pass, Bian Que alone strange him, constant respectful meet him.
translations.idiomatic: A guest at the lodging, Elder Sang, passed through. Bian Que alone found him extraordinary and constantly treated him with respect.

sentences.zh: 長桑君亦知扁鵲非常人也。

translations.literal: Chang Sang Jun also know Bian Que not common person.
translations.idiomatic: Elder Sang also knew Bian Que was no ordinary person.

sentences.zh: 出入十餘年，乃呼扁鵲私坐，閒與語曰：「我有禁方，年老，欲傳與公，公毋泄。」

translations.literal: Enter exit ten remain years, then call Bian Que private sit, leisure with speak said: "I have forbidden recipe, year old, desire transmit with gong, gong not leak."
translations.idiomatic: After coming and going for over ten years, he called Bian Que to sit privately, and casually said to him: "I have secret prescriptions. I am old and wish to pass them to you, do not leak them."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「敬諾。」

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Respectful promise."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "I respectfully accept."

sentences.zh: 乃出其懷中藥予扁鵲：「飲是以上池之水，三十日當知物矣。」

translations.literal: Then exit his bosom middle medicine give Bian Que: "Drink this with shang pool water, thirty days should know things."
translations.idiomatic: Then he took medicine from his bosom and gave it to Bian Que: "Drink this with water from an upper pond, after thirty days you will perceive things."

sentences.zh: 乃悉取其禁方書盡與扁鵲。

translations.literal: Then all take his forbidden recipe book all give Bian Que.
translations.idiomatic: Then he took all his secret prescription books and gave them all to Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 忽然不見，殆非人也。

translations.literal: Suddenly not see, probably not person.
translations.idiomatic: He suddenly disappeared, probably not a mortal.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲以其言飲藥三十日，視見垣一方人。

translations.literal: Bian Que with his words drink medicine thirty days, view see wall one side people.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que followed his words and drank the medicine for thirty days, then could see through walls to the people on the other side.

sentences.zh: 以此視病，盡見五藏癥結，特以診脈為名耳。

translations.literal: With this view illness, all see five zang disease blockage, special with diagnose pulse become name ear.
translations.idiomatic: Using this to examine illnesses, he could see all the blockages in the five viscera, but used pulse diagnosis as his official name.

sentences.zh: 為醫或在齊，或在趙。

translations.literal: Become doctor or in Qi, or in Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: As a physician he practiced either in Qi or in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 在趙者名扁鵲。

translations.literal: In Zhao called Bian Que.
translations.idiomatic: In Zhao he was called Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 當晉昭公時，諸大夫彊而公族弱，趙簡子為大夫，專國事。

translations.literal: When Jin Zhao Gong time, various da fu strong yet gong clan weak, Zhao Jian Zi become da fu, specialized state affairs.
translations.idiomatic: During the time of Duke Zhao of Jin, the various ministers were strong while the ducal clan was weak. Zhao Jianzi served as minister and monopolized state affairs.

sentences.zh: 簡子疾，五日不知人，大夫皆懼，於是召扁鵲。

translations.literal: Jian Zi illness, five days not know person, da fu all fear, then summon Bian Que.
translations.idiomatic: Jianzi fell ill, for five days unconscious. All the ministers were afraid, so they summoned Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲入視病，出，董安于問扁鵲，扁鵲曰：「血脈治也，而何怪！

translations.literal: Bian Que enter view illness, exit, Dong An Yu ask Bian Que, Bian Que said: "Blood vessels treat yet what strange!
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que entered to examine the illness, then came out. Dong Anyu asked Bian Que, who said: "The blood vessels are in order, what is there to be surprised about!

sentences.zh: 昔秦穆公嘗如此，七日而寤。

translations.literal: Former Qin Mu Gong once like this, seven days yet awake.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly Duke Mu of Qin was once like this, after seven days he awoke.

sentences.zh: 寤之日，告公孫支與子輿曰：『我之帝所甚樂。

translations.literal: Awake day, tell Gong Sun Zhi with Zi Yu said: "I at di place very happy.
translations.idiomatic: On the day he awoke, he told Gongsun Zhi and Ziyv: "I was very happy in the emperor's place.

sentences.zh: 吾所以久者，適有所學也。

translations.literal: I so long, suitable have what learn.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I stayed so long was that I had something to learn.

sentences.zh: 帝告我：「晉國且大亂，五世不安。

translations.literal: Di tell me: "Jin state and big chaos, five generations not settle.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor told me: "Jin state will soon have great chaos, five generations without peace.

sentences.zh: 其後將霸，未老而死。

translations.literal: Its after will ba, not old yet die.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward it will become hegemon, but die before old age.

sentences.zh: 霸者之子且令而國男女無別。」』

translations.literal: Ba person son and make his state male female no distinguish.""
translations.idiomatic: The hegemon's son will cause his state to have no distinction between men and women.""

sentences.zh: 公孫支書而藏之，秦策於是出。

translations.literal: Gong Sun Zhi book yet hide it, Qin ce at this exit.
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Zhi wrote it and hid it, and the Qin strategies emerged from this.

sentences.zh: 夫獻公之亂，文公之霸，而襄公敗秦師於殽而歸縱淫，此子之所聞。

translations.literal: Fu Xian Gong chaos, Wen Gong ba, yet Xiang Gong defeat Qin army at Xiao yet return indulge lewd, this son what hear.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Xian's chaos, Duke Wen's hegemony, Duke Xiang defeating the Qin army at Xiao and returning to indulge in lewdness—this is what the son has heard.

sentences.zh: 今主君之病與之同，不出三日必閒，閒必有言也。」

translations.literal: Now lord jun illness with it same, not out three days must wake, wake must have words."
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord's illness is the same as his, within three days he must awaken, and when he awakens he will certainly have words."

sentences.zh: 居二日半，簡子寤，語諸大夫曰：「我之帝所甚樂，與百神游於鈞天，廣樂九奏萬舞，不類三代之樂，其聲動心。

translations.literal: Live two days half, Jian Zi wake, speak various da fu said: "I at di place very happy, with hundred spirits wander at Hun Tian, broad music nine play wan dance, not like three generations music, its sound move heart.
translations.idiomatic: After two and a half days, Jianzi awoke and spoke to the various ministers: "I was very happy in the emperor's place, wandering with the hundred spirits in the Grand Heaven, broad music with nine performances and myriad dances, unlike the music of the Three Dynasties, its sound moved the heart.

sentences.zh: 有一熊欲援我，帝命我射之，中熊，熊死。

translations.literal: Have one bear desire pull me, Di command me shoot it, middle bear, bear die.
translations.idiomatic: There was a bear that wanted to attack me, the emperor commanded me to shoot it, I hit the bear, the bear died.

sentences.zh: 有羆來，我又射之，中羆，羆死。

translations.literal: Have pi come, I again shoot it, middle pi, pi die.
translations.idiomatic: A pi bear came, I shot it again, hit the pi bear, the pi bear died.

sentences.zh: 帝甚喜，賜我二笥，皆有副。

translations.literal: Di very happy, grant me two si, all have fu.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor was very pleased, granted me two baskets, both with duplicates.

sentences.zh: 吾見兒在帝側，帝屬我一翟犬，曰：『及而子之壯也以賜之。』

translations.literal: I see child at Di side, Di belong me one Di dog, said: "Reach your son strong also with grant him."
translations.idiomatic: I saw a child at the emperor's side, the emperor entrusted me with a Di dog, saying: "When your son grows strong, grant it to him."

sentences.zh: 帝告我：『晉國且世衰，七世而亡。

translations.literal: Di tell me: "Jin state and world decline, seven generations yet perish.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor told me: "Jin state will decline generation by generation, after seven generations it will perish.

sentences.zh: 嬴姓將大敗周人於范魁之西，而亦不能有也。』」

translations.literal: Ying surname will big defeat Zhou person at Fan Kui west, yet also cannot have it.""
translations.idiomatic: The Ying surname will greatly defeat the Zhou people west of Fan Kui, but will also not be able to possess it.""

sentences.zh: 董安于受言，書而藏之。

translations.literal: 董安于受言，書而藏之，以扁鵲言告簡子，簡子賜扁鵲田四萬畝。
translations.idiomatic: Dong Anyu received the words, wrote them and hid them, told Jianzi according to Bian Que's words, Jianzi granted Bian Que four thousand mu of fields.

sentences.zh: 以扁鵲言告簡子，簡子賜扁鵲田四萬畝。

translations.literal: 其後過虢，虢太子死，扁鵲至虢宮門下，問中庶子喜方者曰：「太子何病，國中治穰過於衆事？」
translations.idiomatic: Afterward passing through Guo, the Guo crown prince died. Bian Que came to the Guo palace gate and asked the palace attendant Xi Fang: "What illness did the crown prince have, that the state's treatment was so elaborate beyond all other matters?"

sentences.zh: 其後扁鵲過虢。

translations.literal: 中庶子曰：「太子病血氣不时，交錯而不得泄，暴發於外，則為中害。
translations.idiomatic: The palace attendant said: "The crown prince's illness was that his vital energies were irregular, entangled and could not be released, suddenly erupting outward, becoming internal harm.

sentences.zh: 虢太子死，扁鵲至虢宮門下，問中庶子喜方者曰：「太子何病，國中治穰過於眾事？」

translations.literal: 精神不能止邪氣，邪氣畜積而不得泄，是以陽緩而陰急，故暴蹶而死。」
translations.idiomatic: The spirit could not stop the evil energies, evil energies accumulated and could not be released, therefore yang was sluggish and yin was urgent, thus he suddenly collapsed and died."

sentences.zh: 中庶子曰：「太子病血氣不時，交錯而不得泄，暴發於外，則為中害。

translations.literal: 扁鵲曰：「其死何如時？」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "When did he die?"

sentences.zh: 精神不能止邪氣，邪氣畜積而不得泄，是以陽緩而陰急，故暴蹷而死。」

translations.literal: 曰：「雞鳴至今。」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "From cockcrow until now."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「其死何如時？」

translations.literal: 曰：「收乎？」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "Has he been encoffined?"

sentences.zh: 曰：「雞鳴至今。」

translations.literal: 曰：「未也，其死未能半日也。」
translations.idiomatic: He said: "Not yet, his death has not been half a day."

sentences.zh: 曰：「收乎？」

translations.literal: 趙太子曰：「聞醫如秦穆公及平公也，兒不請勿往。」
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao crown prince said: "I have heard that physicians are like Duke Mu of Qin and Duke Ping, do not go if not requested."

sentences.zh: 曰：「未也，其死未能半日也。」

translations.literal: 至國，視太子，驚曰：「太子未死也。
translations.idiomatic: Arriving in the state, he examined the crown prince and was shocked, saying: "The crown prince is not dead.

sentences.zh: 「言臣齊勃海秦越人也，家在於鄭，未嘗得望精光侍謁於前也。

translations.literal: 扁鵲乃使弟子子陽厲鍼砥石，以取外三陽五會。
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que then had his disciple Ziyang sharpen the needle on stone, to take the outer three yang and five convergence points.

sentences.zh: 聞太子不幸而死，臣能生之。」

translations.literal: 有間，太子蘇。
translations.idiomatic: After a while, the crown prince revived.

sentences.zh: 中庶子曰：「先生得無誕之乎？

translations.literal: 乃使子豹為五分之熨，以八減之劑和煮之，以更熨兩脅下。
translations.idiomatic: Then he had Zibao make a five-part compress, mixed and boiled with an eight-reduction formula, to alternately compress both sides below the ribs.

sentences.zh: 何以言太子可生也！

translations.literal: 太子起坐。更適陰陽，但服湯二旬而復故。
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince sat up. He adjusted yin and yang, but after taking the decoction for twenty days he recovered as before.

sentences.zh: 臣聞上古之時，醫有俞跗，治病不以湯液醴灑，鑱石撟引，案扤毒熨，一撥見病之應，因五藏之輸，乃割皮解肌，訣脈結筋，搦髓腦，揲荒爪幕，湔浣腸胃，漱滌五藏，練精易形。

translations.literal: 故天下盡以扁鵲為能生死人。
translations.idiomatic: Therefore all under heaven considered Bian Que able to bring the dead back to life.

sentences.zh: 先生之方能若是，則太子可生也；

translations.literal: 扁鵲過齊，齊桓侯客之，入朝見，曰：「君有疾在腠理，不治將深。」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que passed through Qi, Duke Huan of Qi hosted him. Entering court to see him, he said: "Your lordship has an illness in the skin texture, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 不能若是而欲生之，曾不可以告咳嬰之兒。」

translations.literal: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 終日，扁鵲仰天嘆曰：「夫子之為方也，若以管窺天，以郄視文。

translations.literal: 扁鵲出，桓侯謂左右曰：「醫之好利也，欲以不疾者為功。」
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan said to those at his sides: "Physicians love profit, wanting to claim merit with those who have no illness."

sentences.zh: 越人之為方也，不待切脈望色聽聲寫形，言病之所在。

translations.literal: Yue Ren become method, not wait cut pulse hope color listen sound write form, speak illness place.
translations.idiomatic: Yue Ren's method did not wait for pulse cutting, complexion observation, sound listening, or form recording to speak of the illness's location.

sentences.zh: 聞病之陽，論得其陰；

translations.literal: Hear illness yang, discuss get its yin;
translations.idiomatic: Hearing the illness's yang, he discussed and obtained its yin;

sentences.zh: 聞病之陰，論得其陽。

translations.literal: Hear illness yin, discuss get its yang.
translations.idiomatic: Hearing the illness's yin, he discussed and obtained its yang.

sentences.zh: 病應見於大表，不出千里，決者至眾，不可曲止也。

translations.literal: Illness should see at big table, not out thousand li, decide person reach many, not able bend stop.
translations.idiomatic: The illness should appear on the great surface, not going beyond a thousand li, those who decide reach many, cannot be arbitrarily stopped.

sentences.zh: 子以吾言為不誠，試入診太子，當聞其耳鳴而鼻張，循其兩股以至於陰，當尚溫也。」

translations.literal: Zi with I speak become not sincere, try enter diagnose crown prince, should hear his ear ring yet nose expand, follow his two thighs to reach yin, should still warm."
translations.idiomatic: You consider my words insincere, try entering to diagnose the crown prince, you should hear his ears ringing and nose flaring, following his two thighs to reach the yin, it should still be warm."

sentences.zh: 中庶子聞扁鵲言，目眩然而不瞚，舌撟然而不下，乃以扁鵲言入報虢君。

translations.literal: Zhong pu zi hear Bian Que speak, eye dizzy yet not blink, tongue extend yet not descend, then with Bian Que speak enter report Guo jun.
translations.idiomatic: The palace attendant heard Bian Que's words, eyes dazzled but not blinking, tongue extended but not descending, then entered with Bian Que's words to report to the Guo ruler.

sentences.zh: 虢君聞之大驚，出見扁鵲於中闕，曰：「竊聞高義之日久矣，然未嘗得拜謁於前也。

translations.literal: Guo jun hear very shocked, exit see Bian Que at zhong que, said: "Secret hear high righteousness day long, yet not once obtain bow ye at front.
translations.idiomatic: The Guo ruler heard and was greatly shocked, came out to see Bian Que at the middle gate, saying: "I have secretly heard of your noble righteousness for a long time, yet never once obtained to bow and visit before you.

sentences.zh: 先生過小國，幸而舉之，偏國寡臣幸甚。

translations.literal: Sir pass small state, fortunate yet raise it, partial state few minister fortunate very.
translations.idiomatic: Sir passes through our small state, fortunately raises this matter, our partial state and few ministers are very fortunate.

sentences.zh: 有先生則活，無先生則棄捐填溝壑，長終而不得反。」

translations.literal: Have sir then live, no sir then abandon throw fill ravine valley, long end yet not obtain return."
translations.idiomatic: With sir then he lives, without sir then he is abandoned and thrown to fill the ravines and valleys, eternally ended and cannot return."

sentences.zh: 言末卒，因噓唏服臆，魂精泄橫，流涕長潸，忽忽承睫，悲不能自止，容貌變更。

translations.literal: Speak not finish, because sigh weep serve breast, soul essence leak horizontal, flow tears long moist, hu hu accept jie, sad cannot self stop, appearance change.
translations.idiomatic: The words not yet finished, he sighed and wept embracing his breast, soul essence leaking horizontally, flowing tears long moistening, suddenly accepting the eyelashes, sorrow could not be stopped by himself, appearance changed.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「若太子病，所謂『尸蹷』者也。

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "If crown prince illness, so call "shi jue" person.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "The crown prince's illness is what is called 'corpse convulsions.'

sentences.zh: 夫以陽入陰中，動胃繵緣，中經維絡，別下於三焦、膀胱，是以陽脈下遂，陰脈上爭，會氣閉而不通，陰上而陽內行，下內鼓而不起，上外絕而不為使，上有絕陽之絡，下有破陰之紐，破陰絕陽，（之）色［已］廢脈亂，故形靜如死狀。

translations.literal: Fu with yang enter yin middle, move stomach ji yuan, middle classics wei luo, distinguish descend at three jiao, bladder, therefore yang pulse descend sui, yin pulse shang contend, meet qi close yet not through, yin shang yet yang inner walk, descend inner drum yet not rise, shang outer break yet not become make, shang have break yang luo, descend have break yin niu, break yin break yang, color already waste pulse chaos, therefore form quiet like die shape.
translations.idiomatic: Because yang entered the yin center, moved the stomach and entangled the vessels, through the central classics and binding networks, separately descending to the three burners and bladder, therefore yang pulses descended and followed, yin pulses ascended and contended, meeting energies closed and not through, yin ascended yet yang walked inwardly, lower internal drumming yet not rising, upper external severance yet not functioning, above having severed yang networks, below having broken yin knots, broken yin severed yang, appearance already wasted pulses chaotic, therefore form quiet like death shape.

sentences.zh: 太子未死也。

translations.literal: Crown prince not die.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince is not dead.

sentences.zh: 夫以陽入陰支蘭藏者生，以陰入陽支蘭藏者死。

translations.literal: Fu with yang enter yin branch lan hide live, with yin enter yang branch lan hide die.
translations.idiomatic: Because yang entering yin branch vessels lives, yin entering yang branch vessels dies.

sentences.zh: 凡此數事，皆五藏蹙中之時暴作也。

translations.literal: All this several affairs, all five hide cu middle time violent make.
translations.idiomatic: All these several matters are all sudden attacks at the time of the five viscera's contraction.

sentences.zh: 良工取之，拙者疑殆。」

translations.literal: Good work take it, clumsy person doubt dai."
translations.idiomatic: Good craftsmen take it, clumsy ones doubt and hesitate."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲乃使弟子子陽厲鍼砥石，以取外三陽五會。

translations.literal: Bian Que then make disciple Zi Yang li needle di stone, with take outer three yang five meet.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que then had his disciple Ziyang sharpen the needle on stone, to take the outer three yang and five convergence points.

sentences.zh: 有閒，太子蘇。

translations.literal: Have interval, crown prince su.
translations.idiomatic: After an interval, the crown prince revived.

sentences.zh: 乃使子豹為五分之熨，以八減之齊和煮之，以更熨兩脅下。

translations.literal: Then make Zi Bao become five divide compress, with eight reduce decoction mix boil it, with more compress two sides descend.
translations.idiomatic: Then he had Zibao make a five-part compress, mixed and boiled with an eight-reduction decoction, to alternately compress both sides below.

sentences.zh: 太子起坐。

translations.literal: Crown prince rise sit.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince sat up.

sentences.zh: 更適陰陽，但服湯二旬而復故。

translations.literal: More adapt yin yang, but serve soup two ten yet recover old.
translations.idiomatic: He adjusted yin and yang more, but after taking the decoction for twenty days he recovered as before.

sentences.zh: 故天下盡以扁鵲為能生死人。

translations.literal: Therefore tian xia all with Bian Que become able life death person.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore all under heaven considered Bian Que able to bring the dead back to life.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「越人非能生死人也，此自當生者，越人能使之起耳。」

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Yue Ren not able life death person, this self should live person, Yue Ren able make it rise ear."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "Yue Ren cannot bring the dead to life, these are people who should live themselves, Yue Ren can only make them rise."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲過齊，齊桓侯客之。

translations.literal: Bian Que pass Qi, Qi Huan Hou guest it.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que passed through Qi, Duke Huan of Qi hosted him.

sentences.zh: 入朝見，曰：「君有疾在腠理，不治將深。」

translations.literal: Enter court see, said: "Jun have illness at cou li, not treat will deep."
translations.idiomatic: Entering court to see him, he said: "Your lordship has an illness in the skin texture, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」

translations.literal: Huan Hou said: "Sha ren no illness."
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯謂左右曰：「醫之好利也，欲以不疾者為功。」

translations.literal: Bian Que exit, Huan Hou speak left right said: "Doctor good profit, desire with not illness become merit."
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan said to those at his sides: "Physicians love profit, wanting to claim merit with those who have no illness."

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，曰：「君有疾在血脈，不治恐深。」

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que again see, said: "Jun have illness at blood pulse, not treat fear deep."
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, saying: "Your lordship has an illness in the blood vessels, if not treated I fear it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯曰：「寡人無疾。」

translations.literal: Huan Hou said: "Sha ren no illness."
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan said: "I have no illness."

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯不悅。

translations.literal: Bian Que exit, Huan Hou not happy.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan was displeased.

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，曰；

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que again see, said;
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, saying:

sentences.zh: 「君有疾在腸胃閒，不治將深。」

translations.literal: "Jun have illness at intestine stomach interval, not treat will deep."
translations.idiomatic: "Your lordship has an illness in the space between intestines and stomach, if not treated it will go deep."

sentences.zh: 桓侯不應。

translations.literal: Huan Hou not respond.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan did not respond.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲出，桓侯不悅。

translations.literal: Bian Que exit, Huan Hou not happy.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que left, Duke Huan was displeased.

sentences.zh: 後五日，扁鵲復見，望見桓侯而退走。

translations.literal: After five days, Bian Que again see, hope see Huan Hou yet retreat walk.
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Bian Que saw him again, but seeing Duke Huan he retreated and fled.

sentences.zh: 桓侯使人問其故。

translations.literal: Huan Hou make person ask its reason.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan sent someone to ask the reason.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲曰：「疾之居腠理也，湯熨之所及也；

translations.literal: Bian Que said: "Illness reside cou li, soup compress place reach;
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que said: "When the illness resides in the skin texture, it is where soup compresses can reach;

sentences.zh: 在血脈，鍼石之所及也；

translations.literal: At blood pulse, needle stone place reach;
translations.idiomatic: In the blood vessels, it is where needles and stones can reach;

sentences.zh: 其在腸胃，酒醪之所及也；

translations.literal: Its at intestine stomach, wine lao place reach;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the intestines and stomach, it is where wine medicinals can reach;

sentences.zh: 其在骨髓，雖司命無柰之何。

translations.literal: Its at bone marrow, though Si Ming no what it how.
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the bone marrow, even the Controller of Fate can do nothing about it.

sentences.zh: 今在骨髓，臣是以無請也。」

translations.literal: Now at bone marrow, minister therefore no please."
translations.idiomatic: Now it is in the bone marrow, therefore I have no request."

sentences.zh: 後五日，桓侯體病，使人召扁鵲，扁鵲已逃去。

translations.literal: After five days, Huan Hou body illness, make person summon Bian Que, Bian Que already escape go.
translations.idiomatic: After five days, Duke Huan's body became ill, he sent someone to summon Bian Que, but Bian Que had already fled.

sentences.zh: 桓侯遂死。

translations.literal: Huan Hou then die.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan then died.

sentences.zh: 使聖人預知微，能使良醫得蚤從事，則疾可已，身可活也。

translations.literal: Make saint person pre know wei, able make good doctor obtain early from affairs, then illness able already, body able live.
translations.idiomatic: If sages could foreknow the subtle, able to make good physicians begin affairs early, then illnesses could be cured, bodies could live.

sentences.zh: 人之所病，病疾多；

translations.literal: Person place illness, illness disease many;
translations.idiomatic: What people suffer from illness, illnesses and diseases are many;

sentences.zh: 而醫之所病，病道少。

translations.literal: Yet doctor place illness, illness dao few.
translations.idiomatic: But what physicians suffer from illness, illnesses of the Way are few.

sentences.zh: 故病有六不治：驕恣不論於理，一不治也；

translations.literal: Therefore illness have six not treat: arrogant zi not discuss at li, one not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore illnesses have six that are not treated: arrogant indulgence not discussed according to principle, first not treated;

sentences.zh: 輕身重財，二不治也；

translations.literal: Light body heavy wealth, two not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Lightening the body but valuing wealth heavily, second not treated;

sentences.zh: 衣食不能適，三不治也；

translations.literal: Clothes food cannot adapt, three not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Clothing and food cannot be adapted, third not treated;

sentences.zh: 陰陽并，藏氣不定，四不治也；

translations.literal: Yin yang bing, hide qi not fixed, four not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Yin and yang confused, visceral energies not settled, fourth not treated;

sentences.zh: 形羸不能服藥，五不治也；

translations.literal: Shape lean cannot serve medicine, five not treat;
translations.idiomatic: Body emaciated cannot take medicine, fifth not treated;

sentences.zh: 信巫不信醫，六不治也。

translations.literal: Believe wu not believe doctor, six not treat.
translations.idiomatic: Believing shamans not believing physicians, sixth not treated.

sentences.zh: 有此一者，則重難治也。

translations.literal: Have this one, then heavy difficult treat.
translations.idiomatic: Having one of these, then it is very difficult to treat.

sentences.zh: 扁鵲名聞天下。

translations.literal: Bian Que name hear tian xia.
translations.idiomatic: Bian Que's name was heard throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 過邯鄲，聞貴婦人，即為帶下醫；

translations.literal: Pass Han Dan, hear noble woman person, then become dai xia doctor;
translations.idiomatic: Passing through Handan, hearing that noble women had ailments, he then became a physician for women's diseases;

sentences.zh: 過雒陽，聞周人愛老人，即為耳目痹醫；

translations.literal: Pass Luo Yang, hear Zhou person love old person, then become ear eye bi doctor;
translations.idiomatic: Passing through Luoyang, hearing that Zhou people loved the elderly, he then became a physician for ear and eye ailments;

sentences.zh: 來入咸陽，聞秦人愛小兒，即為小兒醫：隨俗為變。

translations.literal: Come enter Xian Yang, hear Qin person love small child, then become small child doctor: follow custom become change.
translations.idiomatic: Coming to enter Xianyang, hearing that Qin people loved children, he then became a children's physician: following customs he changed.

sentences.zh: 秦太醫令李醯自知伎不如扁鵲也，使人刺殺之。

translations.literal: Qin tai doctor ling Li Xi self know ji not like Bian Que, make person stab kill it.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin Chief Physician Li Xi himself knew his skills were not equal to Bian Que's, so he sent someone to assassinate him.

sentences.zh: 至今天下言脈者，由扁鵲也。

translations.literal: Reach today tian xia speak pulse, by Bian Que.
translations.idiomatic: Until today when all under heaven speak of pulse diagnosis, it originates from Bian Que.

sentences.zh: 太倉公者，齊太倉長，臨菑人也，姓淳于氏，名意。

translations.literal: Tai Cang Gong, Qi tai cang chang, Lin Zi person, surname Chun Yu shi, name Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Tai Cang Gong was the Qi granary director, a Linzi person, surname Chunyu, given name Yi.

sentences.zh: 少而喜醫方術。

translations.literal: Young yet happy doctor method technique.
translations.idiomatic: In youth he delighted in medical arts and techniques.

sentences.zh: 高后八年，更受師同郡元里公乘陽慶。

translations.literal: Gao Hou eight years, more receive teacher same jun Yuan Li Gong Cheng Yang Qing.
translations.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's eighth year, he again received teachings from his fellow commandery man, Gongcheng Yang Qing of Yuanli.

sentences.zh: 慶年七十餘，無子，使意盡去其故方，更悉以禁方予之，傳黃帝、扁鵲之脈書，五色診病，知人死生，決嫌疑，定可治，及藥論，甚精。

translations.literal: Qing year seven ten remain, no son, make Yi all go his old recipe, more all with forbidden recipe give him, transmit Huang Di, Bian Que pulse book, five color diagnose illness, know person death life, decide suspect doubt, fix able treat, and medicine discuss, very refined.
translations.idiomatic: Qing was over seventy years old, had no son, made Yi completely abandon his old prescriptions, and moreover gave him all the secret prescriptions, transmitting the Yellow Emperor and Bian Que's pulse books, five-color diagnosis of illness, knowing people's death and life, deciding suspicions, fixing what can be treated, and medicine discussions, very refined.

sentences.zh: 受之三年，為人治病，決死生多驗。

translations.literal: Receive three years, become person treat illness, decide death life many verify.
translations.idiomatic: After receiving teachings for three years, when treating people's illnesses, his decisions on death and life were mostly verified.

sentences.zh: 然左右行游諸侯，不以家為家，或不為人治病，病家多怨之者。

translations.literal: Yet left right walk travel various hou, not with home become home, or not become person treat illness, illness home many resent him.
translations.idiomatic: Yet he traveled left and right among the various feudal lords, not considering home as home, sometimes not treating people's illnesses, the ill families mostly resented him.

sentences.zh: 文帝四年中，人上書言意，以刑罪當傳西之長安。

translations.literal: Wen Di four years middle, person shang book speak Yi, with punishment crime should pass west zhi Chang An.
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of Emperor Wen's fourth year, someone submitted a memorial speaking of Yi, who due to criminal punishment should be transported west to Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 意有五女，隨而泣。

translations.literal: Yi have five female, follow yet weep.
translations.idiomatic: Yi had five daughters, who followed him weeping.

sentences.zh: 意怒，罵曰：「生子不生男，緩急無可使者！」

translations.literal: Yi angry, curse said: "Born child not born male, slow urgent no able use!"
translations.idiomatic: Yi was angry, cursed saying: "Giving birth to children but not giving birth to males, in times of urgency there's no one to use!"

sentences.zh: 於是少女緹縈傷父之言，乃隨父西。

translations.literal: Then young female Ti Ying hurt father speak, then follow father west.
translations.idiomatic: Then the youngest daughter Tiying was hurt by her father's words, and followed her father west.

sentences.zh: 上書曰：「妾父為吏，齊中稱其廉平，今坐法當刑。

translations.literal: Shang book said: "Qie father become li, Qi middle call his clean level, now sit law should punishment.
translations.idiomatic: She submitted a memorial saying: "My father serves as official, in Qi he is called clean and fair, now convicted by law he should be punished.

sentences.zh: 妾切痛死者不可復生而刑者不可復續，雖欲改過自新，其道莫由，終不可得。

translations.literal: Qie cut pain dead person not able return live yet punishment person not able return continue, though desire change fault self new, its dao not by, end not able obtain.
translations.idiomatic: I deeply grieve that the dead cannot be brought back to life and the punished cannot have their bodies restored, though desiring to reform faults and renew themselves, there is no way, ultimately cannot be obtained.

sentences.zh: 妾願入身為官婢，以贖父刑罪，使得改行自新也。」

translations.literal: Qie wish enter body become official slave, with redeem father punishment crime, make obtain change conduct self new."
translations.idiomatic: I wish to enter my body as an official slave, to redeem my father's punishment crime, so he may obtain to change his conduct and renew himself."

sentences.zh: 書聞，上悲其意，此歲中亦除肉刑法。

translations.literal: Book hear, shang sad its intent, this year middle also except flesh punishment law.
translations.idiomatic: The memorial was heard, the emperor was saddened by her intent, and in the middle of this year also abolished the mutilating punishment laws.

sentences.zh: 意家居，詔召問所為治病死生驗者幾何人也，主名為誰。

translations.literal: Yi home reside, zhao summon ask what become treat illness death life verify several people, main name become who.
translations.idiomatic: Yi resided at home, an edict summoned him and asked how many people he had treated for illnesses with verified predictions of death and life, and whose main names they were.

sentences.zh: 詔問故太倉長臣意：「方伎所長，及所能治病者？

translations.literal: Zhao ask old tai cang chang minister Yi: "Method ji place long, and able treat illness?"
translations.idiomatic: The edict asked the former granary director Minister Yi: "What are your medical arts skilled in, and what illnesses can you treat?"

sentences.zh: 有其書無有？

translations.literal: Have its book no have?
translations.idiomatic: Do you have its books or not?

sentences.zh: 皆安受學？

translations.literal: All where receive study?
translations.idiomatic: Where did you all receive your studies?

sentences.zh: 受學幾何歲？

translations.literal: Receive study several what year?
translations.idiomatic: How many years did you receive study?

sentences.zh: 嘗有所驗，何縣里人也？

translations.literal: Once have what verify, what county li person?
translations.idiomatic: What verifications have you had, what county and quarter people?

sentences.zh: 何病？

translations.literal: What illness?
translations.idiomatic: What illness?

sentences.zh: 醫藥已，其病之狀皆何如？

translations.literal: Doctor medicine already, its illness shape all what like?
translations.idiomatic: After doctor and medicine, what was the condition of the illness like?

sentences.zh: 具悉而對。」

translations.literal: Ju all yet answer."
translations.idiomatic: Fully and completely answer."

sentences.zh: 臣意對曰：

translations.literal: Minister Yi answer said:
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi replied:

sentences.zh: 自意少時，喜醫藥，醫藥方試之多不驗者。

translations.literal: Self Yi young time, happy doctor medicine, doctor medicine method try many not verify.
translations.idiomatic: From Yi's youth, he delighted in medicine, but tried many medical methods that were not verified.

sentences.zh: 至高后八年，得見師臨菑元里公乘陽慶。

translations.literal: Reach Gao Hou eight years, obtain see teacher Lin Zi Yuan Li Gong Cheng Yang Qing.
translations.idiomatic: Until Empress Gao's eighth year, he obtained to see the teacher Gongcheng Yang Qing of Linzi Yuanli.

sentences.zh: 慶年七十餘，意得見事之。

translations.literal: Qing year seven ten remain, Yi obtain see serve him.
translations.idiomatic: Qing was over seventy years old, Yi obtained to see and serve him.

sentences.zh: 謂意曰：「盡去而方書，非是也。

translations.literal: Speak Yi said: "All go your recipe book, not this.
translations.idiomatic: He said to Yi: "Completely abandon your prescription books, they are not this.

sentences.zh: 慶有古先道遺傳黃帝、扁鵲之脈書，五色診病，知人生死，決嫌疑，定可治，及藥論書，甚精。

translations.literal: Qing have ancient first dao yi transmit Huang Di, Bian Que pulse book, five color diagnose illness, know person life death, decide suspect yi, fix able treat, and medicine discuss book, very refined.
translations.idiomatic: Qing has ancient transmitted teachings of the Yellow Emperor and Bian Que's pulse books, five-color diagnosis of illness, knowing people's life and death, deciding suspicions, fixing what can be treated, and medicine discussion books, very refined.

sentences.zh: 我家給富，心愛公，欲盡以我禁方書悉教公。」

translations.literal: I home give rich, heart love gong, desire all with I forbidden recipe book all teach gong."
translations.idiomatic: My family is wealthy and comfortable, I love you in my heart, I desire to teach you all my secret prescription books completely."

sentences.zh: 臣意即曰：「幸甚，非意之所敢望也。」

translations.literal: Minister Yi then said: "Fortunate very, not Yi place dare hope."
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi then said: "Very fortunate, not something Yi dared hope for."

sentences.zh: 臣意即避席再拜謁，受其脈書上下經、五色診、奇咳術、揆度陰陽外變、藥論、石神、接陰陽禁書，受讀解驗之，可一年所。

translations.literal: Minister Yi then avoid seat again bow ye, receive his pulse book shang xia classic, five color diagnose, strange cough technique, kui du yin yang outer change, medicine discuss, stone god, connect yin yang forbidden book, receive read solve verify it, able one year place.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi then left his seat and bowed twice in respect, received his pulse books of upper and lower classics, five-color diagnosis, strange cough techniques, measuring yin and yang external changes, medicine discussions, stone gods, connecting yin and yang forbidden books, received them and read, explained, and verified them, taking about a year.

sentences.zh: 明歲即驗之，有驗，然尚未精也。

translations.literal: Bright year then verify it, have verify, yet not yet refined.
translations.idiomatic: The next year he then verified them, there were verifications, but not yet refined.

sentences.zh: 要事之三年所，即嘗已為人治，診病決死生，有驗，精良。

translations.literal: Important affairs three years place, then once already become person treat, diagnose illness decide death life, have verify, refined good.
translations.idiomatic: After three years of important study, then he once treated people, diagnosing illnesses and deciding death and life, there were verifications, refined and good.

sentences.zh: 今慶已死十年所，臣意年盡三年，年三十九歲也。

translations.literal: Now Qing already die ten years place, minister Yi year all three years, year thirty nine year.
translations.idiomatic: Now Qing has been dead for about ten years, Minister Yi has completed three years of age, is thirty-nine years old.

sentences.zh: 齊侍御史成自言病頭痛，臣意診其脈，告曰：「君之病惡，不可言也。」

translations.literal: Qi serve yu shi Cheng self speak illness head pain, minister Yi diagnose his pulse, tell said: "Jun illness evil, not able speak."
translations.idiomatic: The Qi Imperial Secretary Cheng himself said he had headache illness, Minister Yi diagnosed his pulse, told him: "Your lordship's illness is serious, cannot be spoken of."

sentences.zh: 即出，獨告成弟昌曰：「此病疽也，內發於腸胃之閒，後五日當擁腫，後八日嘔膿死。」

translations.literal: Then exit, alone tell Cheng brother Chang said: "This illness ju, inner send at intestine stomach interval, after five days should yong zhong, after eight days ou nong die."
translations.idiomatic: Then he left, alone told Cheng's brother Chang: "This illness is a carbuncle, internally developing in the space between intestines and stomach, after five days it should swell and gather, after eight days vomit pus and die."

sentences.zh: 成之病得之飲酒且內。

translations.literal: Cheng illness get it drink wine and nei.
translations.idiomatic: Cheng's illness came from drinking wine and sexual excess.

sentences.zh: 成即如期死。

translations.literal: Cheng then like period die.
translations.idiomatic: Cheng then died as predicted.

sentences.zh: 所以知成之病者，臣意切其脈，得肝氣。

translations.literal: So know Cheng illness, minister Yi cut his pulse, obtain liver qi.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew Cheng's illness was that Minister Yi cut his pulse and obtained liver energy.

sentences.zh: 肝氣濁而靜，此內關之病也。

translations.literal: Liver qi zhuo yet quiet, this inner guan illness.
translations.idiomatic: Liver energy turbid yet quiet, this is an inner barrier illness.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰「脈長而弦，不得代四時者，其病主在於肝。

translations.literal: Pulse method say "pulse long yet string, not able dai four seasons, its illness main at liver.
translations.idiomatic: The pulse method says "pulse long and tense, unable to substitute for the four seasons, the illness mainly resides in the liver.

sentences.zh: 和即經主病也，代則絡脈有過」。

translations.literal: Harmony then classic main illness, dai then luo pulse have fault".
translations.idiomatic: Harmony then the classic governs the illness, substitution then the network vessels have fault."

sentences.zh: 經主病和者，其病得之筋髓里。

translations.literal: Classic main illness harmony person, its illness get it muscle marrow li.
translations.idiomatic: When the classic governs illness in harmony, the illness comes from the muscle marrow interior.

sentences.zh: 其代絕而脈賁者，病得之酒且內。

translations.literal: Its dai break yet pulse ben, illness get it wine and nei.
translations.idiomatic: When substitution breaks and pulse surges, illness comes from wine and sexual excess.

sentences.zh: 所以知其後五日而擁腫，八日嘔膿死者，切其脈時，少陽初代。

translations.literal: So know its after five days yet yong zhong, eight days ou nong die person, cut its pulse time, shao yang initial dai.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew it would swell and gather after five days, vomit pus and die after eight days, when I cut his pulse, lesser yang initially substituted.

sentences.zh: 代者經病，病去過人，人則去。

translations.literal: Dai person classic illness, illness go pass person, person then go.
translations.idiomatic: Substitution means classic illness, illness exceeds the person, person then dies.

sentences.zh: 絡脈主病，當其時，少陽初關一分，故中熱而膿未發也，及五分，則至少陽之界，及八日，則嘔膿死，故上二分而膿發，至界而擁腫，盡泄而死。

translations.literal: Luo pulse main illness, when its time, shao yang initial guan one fen, therefore middle hot yet nong not send, reach five fen, then reach shao yang boundary, reach eight days, then ou nong die, therefore shang two fen yet...
translations.idiomatic: Network vessels govern illness, at that time, lesser yang initially closed one fen, therefore internally hot but pus not erupted, reaching five fen then to lesser yang's boundary, reaching eight days then vomits pus and dies, therefore ascending two fen and...

sentences.zh: 熱上則熏陽明，爛流絡，流絡動則脈結發，脈結發則爛解，故絡交。

translations.literal: Hot shang then xun yang ming, lan liu luo, liu luo move then pulse jie fa, pulse jie fa then lan jie, therefore luo jiao.
translations.idiomatic: Heat ascending then steams the yang brightness, rotting flows the networks, flowing networks move then pulse knots erupt, pulse knots erupt then rot dissolves, therefore networks intersect.

sentences.zh: 熱氣已上行，至頭而動，故頭痛。

translations.literal: Hot qi already shang walk, reach head yet move, therefore head pain.
translations.idiomatic: Hot energy already ascended, reaching the head and moving, therefore headache.

sentences.zh: 齊王中子諸嬰兒小子病，召臣意診切其脈，告曰：「氣鬲病。

translations.literal: Qi wang middle son Zhu Ying Er Xiao Zi illness, summon minister Yi diagnose cut his pulse, tell said: "Qi ge illness.
translations.idiomatic: The Qi king's middle son Zhu Ying'er Xiaozi fell ill, summoned Minister Yi to diagnose and cut his pulse, told him: "Diaphragm energy illness.

sentences.zh: 病使人煩懣，食不下，時嘔沫。

translations.literal: Illness make person fan men, eat not descend, time ou mo.
translations.idiomatic: The illness makes a person vexed and oppressed, unable to eat, sometimes vomiting foam.

sentences.zh: 病得之（少）［心］憂，數忔食飲。」

translations.literal: Illness get it heart you, shu shi eat drink."
translations.idiomatic: The illness comes from heart sorrow, frequently sighing while eating and drinking."

sentences.zh: 臣意即為之作下氣湯以飲之，一日氣下，二日能食，三日即病愈。

translations.literal: Minister Yi then become it make descend qi soup with drink it, one day qi descend, two days able eat, three days then illness cure.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi then made descending energy soup for him to drink, one day energy descended, two days able to eat, three days then illness cured.

sentences.zh: 所以知小子之病者，診其脈，心氣也，濁躁而經也，此絡陽病也。

translations.literal: So know small son illness, diagnose his pulse, heart qi, zhuo zao yet classic, this luo yang illness.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew the young son's illness was diagnosing his pulse—heart energy, turbid and agitated yet classical, this is network yang illness.

sentences.zh: 脈法曰「脈來數疾去難而不一者，病主在心」。

translations.literal: Pulse method say "pulse come shu ji go nan yet not one, illness main at heart".
translations.idiomatic: The pulse method says "pulse comes rapid and urgent goes difficult and not uniform, illness mainly at heart".

sentences.zh: 周身熱，脈盛者，為重陽。

translations.literal: 滎陽嚴長孫女患眩，診之，告曰：「為藥中，病去身溫，六日愈。」
translations.idiomatic: Xingyang Yan's grandson's daughter suffered dizziness, diagnosed her and said: "Take medicine, illness will leave body warm, six days cured."

sentences.zh: 重陽者，逿心主。

sentences.zh: 淳于司馬曰：「我之王家食馬肝，食飽甚，見酒來，即走去，驅疾至舍，即泄數十出。」

translations.literal: Chun Yu si ma said: "I at wang home eat ma gan, eat bao very, see wine come, then go walk, qu ji reach she, then xie shu shi out."
translations.idiomatic: Chunyu Sima said: "I at the king's home ate horse liver, ate very full, saw wine come, then went walking, drove quickly to quarters, then leaked dozens of times."

sentences.zh: 臣意告曰：「為火齊米汁飲之，七八日而當愈。」

translations.literal: Minister Yi tell said: "Become fire qi mi zhi drink it, seven eight days yet should cure."
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi told him: "Make fire elixir rice juice to drink it, in seven or eight days should be cured."

sentences.zh: 時醫秦信在旁，臣意去，信謂左右閣都尉曰：「意以淳于司馬病為何？」

translations.literal: Time doctor Qin Xin at side, minister Yi go, Xin speak left right ge dou wei said: "Yi with Chun Yu si ma illness become he?"
translations.idiomatic: At the time doctor Qin Xin was at the side, Minister Yi left, Xin told the left and right deputy colonel: "Yi considers Chunyu Sima's illness to be what?"

sentences.zh: 曰：「以為迵風，可治。」

translations.literal: Said: "With zheng feng, able treat."
translations.idiomatic: He said: "Considers it straight wind, can treat."

sentences.zh: 信即笑曰：「是不知也。

translations.literal: Xin then laugh said: "This not know.
translations.idiomatic: Xin then laughed and said: "This is not knowing.

sentences.zh: 淳于司馬病，法當後九日死。」

translations.literal: Chun Yu si ma illness, law should after nine days die."
translations.idiomatic: Chunyu Sima's illness, by law should die after nine days."

sentences.zh: 即後九日不死，其家復召臣意。

translations.literal: Then after nine days not die, its home fu summon minister Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Then after nine days did not die, his family again summoned Minister Yi.

sentences.zh: 臣意往問之，盡如意診。

translations.literal: Minister Yi go ask it, jin like Yi diagnose.
translations.idiomatic: Minister Yi went and asked him, completely like Yi diagnosed.

sentences.zh: 臣即為一火齊米汁，使服之，七八日病已。

translations.literal: Minister then become one fire qi mi zhi, make serve it, seven eight days illness already.
translations.idiomatic: Minister then made one fire elixir rice juice, had him take it, seven or eight days illness cured.

sentences.zh: 所以知之者，診其脈時，切之，盡如法。

translations.literal: So know it, diagnose its pulse time, cut it, jin like law.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew it was when diagnosing his pulse, cutting it, completely like the law.

sentences.zh: 其病順，故不死。

translations.literal: Its illness shun, therefore not die.
translations.idiomatic: His illness smooth, therefore did not die.

sentences.zh: 齊中郎破石病，臣意診其脈，告曰：「肺傷，不治，當後十日丁亥溲血死。」

translations.literal: Qi zhong lang Po Shi illness, minister Yi diagnose its pulse, tell said: "Fei hurt, not treat, should after ten days Ding Hai sou blood die."
translations.idiomatic: Qi central colonel Po Shi fell ill, Minister Yi diagnosed his pulse and told him: "Lung injured, cannot treat, should after ten days Dinghai urinate blood and die."

sentences.zh: 即後十一日，溲血而死。

translations.literal: Then after eleven days, sou blood yet die.
translations.idiomatic: Then after eleven days, urinated blood and died.

sentences.zh: 破石之病，得之墮馬僵石上。

translations.literal: Po Shi illness get it duo ma jiang shi shang.
translations.idiomatic: Po Shi's illness came from falling from horse stiff on stone.

sentences.zh: 所以知破石之病者，切其脈，得肺陰氣，其來散，數道至而不一也。

translations.literal: So know Po Shi illness, cut its pulse, get fei yin qi, its lai san, shu dao reach yet not one.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew Po Shi's illness was cutting his pulse, obtained lung yin energy, its coming scattered, several paths arrive but not unified.

sentences.zh: 色又乘之。

translations.literal: Color again multiply it.
translations.idiomatic: Color moreover multiplied it.

sentences.zh: 所以知其墮馬者，切之得番陰脈。

translations.literal: So know its duo ma, cut it get fan yin pulse.
translations.idiomatic: The reason I knew his falling from horse was cutting him obtained flipped yin pulse.

sentences.zh: 番陰脈入虛里，乘肺脈。

translations.literal: Fan yin pulse enter xu li, multiply lung pulse.
translations.idiomatic: Flipped yin pulse enters void li, multiplies lung pulse.

sentences.zh: 肺脈散者，固色變也乘也。

translations.literal: Lung pulse san person, gu color change also multiply.
translations.idiomatic: Lung pulse scattered means firmly color changed also multiplied.

sentences.zh: 所以不中期死者，師言曰：「病者安穀即過期，不安穀則不及期」。

translations.literal: So not zhong period die person, shi speak say: "Illness person an gu then exceed period, not an gu then not reach period".
translations.idiomatic: The reason not mid-period died is master said: "Illness people settle grain then exceed period, not settle grain then not reach period".

sentences.zh: 其人嗜黍，黍主肺，故過期。

translations.literal: Its person shi shu, shu main lung, therefore exceed period.
translations.idiomatic: The person liked millet, millet governs lung, therefore exceeded period.

sentences.zh: 所以溲血者，診脈法曰「病養喜陰處者順死，養喜陽處者逆死」。

translations.literal: So sou blood person, diagnose pulse law say "illness yang xi yin chu person shun die, yang xi yang chu person ni die".
translations.idiomatic: The reason urinated blood is diagnose pulse law says "illness raising likes yin place smooth dies, raising likes yang place contrary dies".

sentences.zh: 其人喜自靜，不躁，又久安坐，伏几而寐，故血下泄。
齊王侍醫遂病，自練五石服之。
臣意往過之，遂謂意曰：「不肖有病，幸診遂也。」
臣意即診之，告曰：「公病中熱。
論曰『中熱不溲者，不可服五石』。
石之為藥精悍，公服之不得數溲，亟勿服。
色將發臃。」
遂曰：「扁鵲曰『陰石以治陰病，陽石以治陽病』。
夫藥石者有陰陽水火之齊，故中熱，即為陰石柔齊治之；
中寒，即為陽石剛齊治之。」
臣意曰：「公所論遠矣。
扁鵲雖言若是，然必審診，起度量，立規矩，稱權衡，合色脈表裏有餘不足順逆之法，參其人動靜與息相應，乃可以論。
論曰『陽疾處內，陰形應外者，不加悍藥及鑱石』。
夫悍藥入中，則邪氣辟矣，而宛氣愈深。
診法曰『二陰應外，一陽接內者，不可以剛藥』。
剛藥入則動陽，陰病益衰，陽病益箸，邪氣流行，為重困於俞，忿發為疽。」
意告之後百餘日，果為疽發乳上，入缺盆，死。
此謂論之大體也，必有經紀。
拙工有一不習，文理陰陽失矣。
齊王故為陽虛侯時，病甚，眾醫皆以為蹷。
臣意診脈，以為痹，根在右脅下，大如覆杯，令人喘，逆氣不能食。
臣意即以火齊粥且飲，六日氣下；
即令更服丸藥，出入六日，病已。
病得之內。
診之時不能識其經解，大識其病所在。
臣意嘗診安陽武都裏成開方，開方自言以為不病，臣意謂之病苦沓風，三歲四支不能自用，使人瘖，瘖即死。
今聞其四支不能用，瘖而未死也。
病得之數飲酒以見大風氣。
所以知成開方病者，診之，其脈法奇咳言曰「藏氣相反者死」。
切之，得腎反肺，法曰「三歲死」也。
安陵阪裏公乘項處病，臣意診脈，曰：「牡疝。」
牡疝在鬲下，上連肺。
病得之內。
臣意謂之：「慎毋為勞力事，為勞力事則必嘔血死。」
處後蹴踘，要蹷寒，汗出多，即嘔血。
臣意復診之，曰：「當旦日日夕死。」
即死。
病得之內。
所以知項處病者，切其脈得番陽。
番陽入虛裏，處旦日死。
一番一絡者，牡疝也。
臣意曰：他所診期決死生及所治已病眾多，久頗忘之，不能盡識，不敢以對。
問臣意：「所診治病，病名多同而診異，或死或不死，何也？」
對曰：「病名多相類，不可知，故古聖人為之脈法，以起度量，立規矩，縣權衡，案繩墨，調陰陽，別人之脈各名之，與天地相應，參合於人，故乃別百病以異之，有數者能異之，無數者同之。
然脈法不可勝驗，診疾人以度異之，乃可別同名，命病主在所居。
今臣意所診者，皆有診籍。
所以別之者，臣意所受師方適成，師死，以故表籍所診，期決死生，觀所失所得者合脈法，以故至今知之。」
問臣意曰：「所期病決死生，或不應期，何故？」
對曰：「此皆飲食喜怒不節，或不當飲藥，或不當鍼灸，以故不中期死也。」
問臣意：「意方能知病死生，論藥用所宜，諸侯王大臣有嘗問意者不？
及文王病時，不求意診治，何故？」
對曰：「趙王、膠西王、濟南王、吳王皆使人來召臣意，臣意不敢往。
文王病時，臣意家貧，欲為人治病，誠恐吏以除拘臣意也，故移名數，左右不修家生，出行游國中，問善為方數者事之久矣，見事數師，悉受其要事，盡其方書意，及解論之。
身居陽虛侯國，因事侯。
侯入朝，臣意從之長安，以故得診安陵項處等病也。」
問臣意：「知文王所以得病不起之狀？」
臣意對曰：「不見文王病，然竊聞文王病喘，頭痛，目不明。
臣意心論之，以為非病也。
以為肥而蓄精，身體不得搖，骨肉不相任，故喘，不當醫治。
脈法曰『年二十脈氣當趨，年三十當疾步，年四十當安坐，年五十當安臥，年六十已上氣當大董』。
文王年未滿二十，方脈氣之趨也而徐之，不應天道四時。
後聞醫灸之即篤，此論病之過也。
臣意論之，以為神氣爭而邪氣入，非年少所能復之也，以故死。
所謂氣者，當調飲食，擇晏日，車步廣志，以適筋骨肉血脈，以瀉氣。
故年二十，是謂『易眢』。
法不當砭灸，砭灸至氣逐。」
問臣意：「師慶安受之？
聞於齊諸侯不？」
對曰：「不知慶所師受。
慶家富，善為醫，不肯為人治病，當以此故不聞。
慶又告臣意曰：『慎毋令我子孫知若學我方也。』」
問臣意：「師慶何見於意而愛意，欲悉教意方？」
對曰：「臣意不聞師慶為方善也。
意所以知慶者，意少時好諸方事，臣意試其方，皆多驗，精良。
臣意聞菑川唐裏公孫光善為古傳方，臣意即往謁之。
得見事之，受方化陰陽及傳語法，臣意悉受書之。
臣意欲盡受他精方，公孫光曰：『吾方盡矣，不為愛公所。
吾身已衰，無所復事之。
是吾年少所受妙方也，悉與公，毋以教人。』
臣意曰：『得見事侍公前，悉得禁方，幸甚。
意死不敢妄傳人。』
居有閒，公孫光閒處，臣意深論方，見言百世為之精也。
師光喜曰：『公必為國工。
吾有所善者皆疏，同產處臨菑，善為方，吾不若，其方甚奇，非世之所聞也。
吾年中時，嘗欲受其方，楊中倩不肯，曰「若非其人也」。
胥與公往見之，當知公喜方也。
其人亦老矣，其家給富。』
時者未往，會慶子男殷來獻馬，因師光奏馬王所，意以故得與殷善。
光又屬意於殷曰：『意好數，公必謹遇之，其人聖儒。』
即為書以意屬陽慶，以故知慶。
臣意事慶謹，以故愛意也。」
問臣意曰：「吏民嘗有事學意方，及畢盡得意方不？
何縣里人？」
對曰：「臨菑人宋邑。
邑學，臣意教以五診，歲餘。
濟北王遣太醫高期、王禹學，臣意教以經脈高下及奇絡結，當論俞所居，及氣當上下出入邪［正］逆順，以宜鑱石，定砭灸處，歲餘。
菑川王時遣太倉馬長馮信正方，臣意教以案法逆順，論藥法，定五味及和齊湯法。
高永侯家丞杜信，喜脈，來學，臣意教以上下經脈五診，二歲餘。
臨菑召裏唐安來學，臣意教以五診上下經脈，奇咳，四時應陰陽重，未成，除為齊王侍醫。」
問臣意：「診病決死生，能全無失乎？」
臣意對曰：「意治病人，必先切其脈，乃治之。
敗逆者不可治，其順者乃治之。
心不精脈，所期死生視可治，時時失之，臣意不能全也。」
太史公曰：女無美惡，居宮見妒；
士無賢不肖，入朝見疑。
故扁鵲以其伎見殃，倉公乃匿跡自隱而當刑。
緹縈通尺牘，父得以後寧。
故老子曰「美好者不祥之器」，豈謂扁鵲等邪？
若倉公者，可謂近之矣。
